name: Escaping the Island
description: You will play for the character Stickman, who found himself on the island of survival. Your task is to help the character Stick to survive successfully or get out of this island. You will have a lot of items in your pocket and only two items will lead you to victory. Solve puzzles and various problems that will be on your way. Savages, predators are only part of the problems on the island. Make your unique escape from the island!
